Package control

Class CompanyRepresentativeManager

Object
CompanyRepresentativeManager
public class CompanyRepresentativeManager extends Object
Manager class for company representative operations. Handles internship creation, modification, application reviews, and acceptance decisions.
Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • saveData

      private void saveData()
      Saves all current data to their respective file paths.

    • createInternship

      public boolean createInternship(CompanyRepresentative rep, String title, String description, String level, String preferredMajor, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, int numSlots)
      Creates a new internship for the specified company representative. Each company representative can create a maximum of 5 internships.
      Parameters:
      rep - the company representative creating the internship
      title - the title of the internship
      description - the description of the internship
      level - the level of the internship
      preferredMajor - the preferred major for this internship
      openingDate - the date when applications open
      closingDate - the date when applications close
      numSlots - the number of internship slots available
      Returns:
      true if creation was successful, false if the rep has reached the creation limit

    • getCreatedInternships

      public List<Internship> getCreatedInternships(CompanyRepresentative rep)
      Retrieves all internships created by the specified company representative.
      Parameters:
      rep - the company representative
      Returns:
      a list of internships created by this representative

    • getApplicationsForInternship

      public List<InternshipApplication> getApplicationsForInternship(String internshipID)
      Retrieves all applications for a specific internship.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the unique identifier of the internship
      Returns:
      a list of applications for the internship, or an empty list if internship not found

    • approveApplication

      public boolean approveApplication(String applicationID)
      Approves a pending internship application by its ID.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - the unique identifier of the application
      Returns:
      true if approval was successful, false otherwise

    • approveApplication

      public boolean approveApplication(String applicationID, String repID)
      Approves a pending internship application with optional activity logging.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - the unique identifier of the application
      repID - the representative ID performing the approval (for activity logging)
      Returns:
      true if approval was successful, false otherwise

    • rejectApplication

      public boolean rejectApplication(String applicationID)
      Rejects a pending internship application by its ID.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - the unique identifier of the application
      Returns:
      true if rejection was successful, false otherwise

    • rejectApplication

      public boolean rejectApplication(String applicationID, String repID)
      Rejects a pending internship application with optional activity logging.
      Parameters:
      applicationID - the unique identifier of the application
      repID - the representative ID performing the rejection (for activity logging)
      Returns:
      true if rejection was successful, false otherwise

    • getStudentDetails

      public Student getStudentDetails(String studentID)
      Retrieves student details by their ID.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the unique identifier of the student
      Returns:
      the student object, or null if not found

    • toggleInternshipVisibility

      public void toggleInternshipVisibility(String internshipID)
      Toggles the visibility status of an internship by its ID.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the unique identifier of the internship

    • toggleInternshipVisibility

      public boolean toggleInternshipVisibility(String internshipID, String repID)
      Toggles the visibility status of an internship with optional activity logging.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the unique identifier of the internship
      repID - the representative ID performing the action (for activity logging)
      Returns:
      true if toggle was successful, false if internship not approved

    • autoSetVisibilityForApprovedInternship

      public void autoSetVisibilityForApprovedInternship(String internshipID)
      Automatically sets an internship as visible if it is approved and currently within the open period.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the unique identifier of the internship

    • getInternshipDetails

      public Internship getInternshipDetails(String internshipID)
      Retrieves internship details by its ID.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the unique identifier of the internship
      Returns:
      the internship object, or null if not found

    • updateInternshipDetails

      public boolean updateInternshipDetails(String internshipID, String title, String description, String level, String preferredMajor, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, int numSlots)
      Updates internship details by its ID. Only pending internships can be updated.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the unique identifier of the internship
      title - the new title (or null to keep existing)
      description - the new description (or null to keep existing)
      level - the new level (or null to keep existing)
      preferredMajor - the new preferred major (or null to keep existing)
      openingDate - the new opening date (or null to keep existing)
      closingDate - the new closing date (or null to keep existing)
      numSlots - the new number of slots (0 or negative to keep existing)
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false if internship not pending or not found

    • updateInternshipDetails

      public boolean updateInternshipDetails(String internshipID, String title, String description, String level, String preferredMajor, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, int numSlots, String repID)
      Updates internship details with optional activity logging. Only pending internships can be updated.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the unique identifier of the internship
      title - the new title (or null to keep existing)
      description - the new description (or null to keep existing)
      level - the new level (or null to keep existing)
      preferredMajor - the new preferred major (or null to keep existing)
      openingDate - the new opening date (or null to keep existing)
      closingDate - the new closing date (or null to keep existing)
      numSlots - the new number of slots (0 or negative to keep existing)
      repID - the representative ID performing the update (for activity logging)
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false if internship not pending or not found

    • deleteInternship

      public boolean deleteInternship(String internshipID, CompanyRepresentative rep)
      Deletes an internship if it belongs to the specified company representative.
      Parameters:
      internshipID - the unique identifier of the internship
      rep - the company representative who should own the internship
      Returns:
      true if deletion was successful, false if internship not found or not owned by rep
